name: Sencha and Mixed Berries Smoothie
description: A marriage between two of our favourite drinks for a healthy, creamy delight!

ingredients.name: low-fat milk or plain soy milk

preparation: Steep Tea in water. Allow to cool.
In a blender or food processor, blend tea with remaining ingredients until smooth.
tips: For that extra punch of flavour, make your tea a little stronger – add an extra teaspoon when brewing!
Top your smoothie with a dollop low-fat plain or vanilla yogurt for an extra creamy finish.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 slice whole-grain toast and 2 tsp nut butter.
